name: Alyx's Mango-Cherry Chicken Salad
author: Alyx
summary: I made this up one day after eating a grape-walnut chicken salad and it turned out fab!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ cup pitted and chopped fresh cherries
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper
Place chicken breasts on the baking sheet
Bake chicken in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 35 to 45 minutes
Remove from oven and cool until easily handled, about 15 minutes
Combine chicken, sour cream, and mayonnaise, salt, and pepper in a food processor; pulse until combined
Fold mango and cherries into the chicken mixture
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate before serving, about 2 hours
